title: This Albino Redwood Tree Isn't Dead â€” But It Came Close
teaser: An extremely rare, albino hermaphroditic redwood tree was in danger of being sent to the chipper because it was growing too close to the path of a new railroad line in Cotati, Calif. But thanks to local outcry from arborists and the community, the tree is getting a second chance at life.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
